Question 40.Question: Please describe any differences in how it impacted your learning (comparing GenAI and your teacher)?
Question 40.Response: I usually get very high marks and teacher feedback is brief and not especially useful.

Question 41.Question: Were there any differences in how the feedback made you feel (comparing GenAI and your teacher)?
Question 41.Response: GenAI feedback can be more easily directed or elaborated upon and this gives it an advantage over static teacher feedback.
